resources.string: Verifique a sua ligação de rede e tente novamente
Os papéis de parede aleatórios estão actualizados
O nome não pode conter apenas espaços
O nome não pode exceder 20 caracteres
O nome tem de ter no mínimo 2 caracteres
A data de nascimento é inválida
Não é possível actualizar a data de nascimento neste momento
Certifique-se que activa a sua conta dentro de 24 horas
Não é possível encontrar a aplicação
Não foi possível adicionar papel de parede
Adicionados papéis de parede com sucesso
Papéis de parede aleatórios foram ligados e iniciada a apresentação
Uma nova versão da aplicação está disponível. Actualizar agora?
Está a utilizar um super papel de parede. Se alterar o papel de parede, vai ser aplicado ao ecrã inicial e de bloqueio. Aplicar agora?
Está a utilizar um super papel de parede. Se alterar o papel de parede, vai ser aplicado ao ecrã inicial e de bloqueio e o ecrã ambiente pode ser reposto para o predefinido. Aplicar agora?
Está a utilizar um tema de terceiros. Se alterar o papel de parede, o relógio do ecrã de bloqueio pode ser reposto para o predefinido. Aplicar agora?
"Os papéis de paredes aleatórios necessitam duma ligação à Internet para funcionar normalmente. Para obter acesso a conteúdo online, tem de concordar com a nossa Política de Privacidade. Concorda?"
Veja lugares lindos e obtenha surpresas excitantes com os papéis de parede aleatórios

A eliminar papéis de parede aleatórios
Introduza o código de verificação em 2 passos

Turn on Wallpaper Carousel to get fresh images and stories delivered to your Lock screen daily.

Agree to the terms and conditions first
The username you entered is invalid
(Users outside China should enter the mobile phone number in the following format: +[area code][phone number], e.g.: +91 817282982)
Password must be 8-16 characters long and combine at least two of the following: digits, letters, and special symbols (e.g. 123abc@#, or 123abc, or abc@#).
Too many accounts have been associated with this number. Try a different one.
You need to sign in again
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
Add your phone number to protect your account.
Check your network settings and try again
"I've read and agree to Xiaomi's User Agreement and Privacy Policy."

The code you entered is incorrect
The format of the phone number you entered is invalid

The code you entered is incorrect
Access photos stored on your device
This phone has been associated with several Mi Accounts in a short period of time. Try using another phone number.
Wallpaper Carousel Privacy Policy was updated:
"Read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue."
"You won't be able to keep using Wallpaper Carousel unless you agree to the new version of its Privacy Policy. Agree to the updated Privacy Policy now?"

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. This app needs the following permissions to work normally:

Using camera (for setting your profile photo)

If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you. You can always restrict permissions or revoke your authorization in the Settings."
A network error occurred. Check your network settings and try again.
A system error occurred. Go back and try again.

Allow access to Gallery:
For setting profile photos
To be able save and view items, allow Wallpaper Carousel to access storage.
It may take some time to receive SMS. Start over anyway?
A network error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Wallpaper Carousel. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Wallpaper Carousel provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Wallpaper Carousel services. Withdraw consent now?"
"Can't be the same as current password"
Session expired. Sign in again to reconnect this account.
Too many attempts. Try other ways to sign in.

"Bem-vindo aos papéis de parede aleatórios! Pode subscrever as suas categorias de papéis de parede favoritas e receber imagens novas todos os dias. Esta aplicação necessita de ligar à Internet para funcionar normalmente.
To provide additional services, we might ask for the permission to access and save items to this device's storage.
To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this app."
"Bem-vindo aos papéis de parede aleatórios! Pode subscrever as suas categorias de papéis de parede favoritas e receber imagens novas todos os dias. "
"To provide additional services, we might ask for the permission to access and save items to this device's storage. "

Wallpaper Carousel allows you to see a new image every time you unlock the device.
You can change wallpaper update frequency in \"Slideshow settings\".
You need to verify your identity before you update the recovery email.

resources.string: Wallpaper Carousel provides the following features:

"1. Automatically updated wallpapers
2. Fresh images and stories delivered to your Lock screen
3. Customization options
This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally.

To provide additional services, we might ask for permission to access and save items to this device's storage. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue."
"You're using mobile data to browse wallpapers. This may generate additional fees."
